price: គាត់(ស៊ូឡៃម៉ាន)បានតបវិញថាៈ យើងនឹងចាំមើលថា តើឯងបាននិយាយពិត ឬក៏និយាយកុហក?
arabic: ۞ قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقۡتَ أَمۡ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: qāla sananẓuru aṣadaqta am kunta mina al-kādhibīna
